title: Gov. DeSantis Clears Way to Revoke Disney’s Special District in Florida - The New York Times
content:
1. Gov. DeSantis Clears Way to Revoke Disney’s Special District in Florida  The New York Times
  2. DeSantis pushes to eliminate Disney's special governing status in Florida  CNN
  3. DeSantis calls on legislature to target Disney's self governing special status: 'Termination'  Fox News
  4. DeSantis unleashes vengeance on Disney. This is the stuff of Nixon’s enemies list | Editorial  Miami Herald
  5. Vengeful DeSantis stampedes lawmakers to attack Disney | Editorial  Orlando Sentinel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Having criticized the company’s stand on a law restricting classroom discussion of sexual identity, he expanded a special session of the Legislature to target Disney World’s self-governing privileges.
